001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Messages;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.PacketArrayList;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.models.PumpResponseMessage;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
009
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
011import org.apache.commons.lang3.NotImplementedException;
012import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
013
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.UUID;
017
018public class BTResponseParser {
019    private static final String TAG = "BTResponseParser";
020
021    public static PumpResponseMessage parse(TronMessageWrapper wrapper, byte[] output, MessageType outputType, UUID uuid) {
022        PacketArrayList packetArrayList = wrapper.buildPacketArrayList(outputType);
023        return parse(wrapper.message(), packetArrayList, output, uuid);
024    }
025
026    @SuppressWarnings("DefaultLocale")
027    public static PumpResponseMessage parse(Message message, PacketArrayList packetArrayList, byte[] output, UUID uuid) {
028        L.d(TAG, "Parsing event with: message: "+message+" \npacketArrayList: "+packetArrayList+" \noutput: "+Hex.encodeHexString(output)+" \nuuid: "+uuid.toString());
029        checkCharacteristicUuid(uuid, output);
030
031        packetArrayList.validatePacket(output);
032        if (!packetArrayList.needsMorePacket()) {
033            byte[] authKeyVal = new byte[0];
034            if (message.signed()) {
035                authKeyVal = PumpStateSupplier.authenticationKey.get();
036            } else {
037                try {
038                    authKeyVal = PumpStateSupplier.authenticationKey.get();
039                } catch (IllegalStateException ignore) {
040                    authKeyVal = new byte[0];
041                }
042            }
043            if (packetArrayList.validate(authKeyVal)) {
044                byte[] a = packetArrayList.messageData();
045                byte[] copyOfRange = Arrays.copyOfRange(a, 3, a.length);
046                byte b4 = packetArrayList.opCode();
047                byte txId = packetArrayList.getExpectedTxId();
048                L.d(TAG, "Parsing message with opcode "+b4);
049                Message msg = Messages.parse(copyOfRange, b4, Characteristic.of(uuid));
050                if (msg == null) {
051                    L.w(TAG, String.format("PARSED-MESSAGE(txId=%-3d, %s)\tFAILURE: %s, %s: %s", txId, CharacteristicUUID.which(uuid), b4, message.signed(), Hex.encodeHexString(copyOfRange)));
052                } else {
053                    L.i(TAG, String.format("PARSED-MESSAGE(txId=%-3d, %s):\t%s", txId, CharacteristicUUID.which(uuid), msg));
054                }
055
056                return new PumpResponseMessage(output, msg);
057            } else {
058                L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayList could not validate");
059            }
060        } else {
061            L.i(TAG, "PacketArrayList needs more packets: "+Hex.encodeHexString(output));
062            return new PumpResponseMessage(output);
063        }
064
065        return new PumpResponseMessage(output);
066    }
067
068    public static PumpResponseMessage parseBestEffortForLogging(byte[] output, UUID uuid) {
069        if (output.length < 3) {
070            L.e(TAG, "parseBestEffortForLogging input has less than 3 bytes");
071            return null;
072        }
073        byte txId = parseTxId(output);
074        byte opCode = parseOpcode(output);
075        MessageType messageType = MessageType.fromOpcodeBestEffort(opCode);
076
077        Message message = null;
078        try {
079            message = Messages.fromOpcode(opCode, Characteristic.of(uuid)).newInstance();
080            message.fillWithEmptyCargo();
081        } catch (NullPointerException|InstantiationException|IllegalAccessException e) {
082            L.e(TAG, "parseBestEffortForLogging", e);
083            return null;
084        }
085
086        try {
087            TronMessageWrapper tron = new TronMessageWrapper(message, (byte) txId);
088            PacketArrayList packetArrayList = tron.buildPacketArrayList(messageType);
089            return BTResponseParser.parse(tron.message(), packetArrayList, output, uuid);
090        } catch (Exception e) {
091            L.e(TAG, "parseBestEffortForLogging", e);
092            return null;
093        }
094    }
095
096    public static Byte parseTxId(byte[] output) {
097        Validate.isTrue(output.length >= 3, "BT-returned data should contain at least 3 bytes: '%s'", Hex.encodeHexString(output));
098        /*
099        output[0] = packet index mod 15
100        output[1] = transaction ID
101        output[2] = opcode
102         */
103        return output[1];
104    }
105
106    public static Byte parseOpcode(byte[] output) {
107        Validate.isTrue(output.length >= 3, "BT-returned data should contain at least 3 bytes: '%s'", Hex.encodeHexString(output));
108        /*
109        output[0] = packet index mod 15
110        output[1] = transaction ID
111        output[2] = opcode
112         */
113        return output[2];
114    }
115
116    private static void checkCharacteristicUuid(UUID uuid, byte[] output) {
117        // if (Intrinsics.areEqual(uuid, TAllowedCharacteristics.authorizationCharacteristics()) || Intrinsics.areEqual(uuid, TAllowedCharacteristics.currentStatusCharacteristics()) || Intrinsics.areEqual(uuid, TAllowedCharacteristics.controlCharacteristics())) {
118        List<UUID> rawBleNotifyUuids = Arrays.asList(
119                CharacteristicUUID.AUTHORIZATION_CHARACTERISTICS,
120                CharacteristicUUID.CURRENT_STATUS_CHARACTERISTICS,
121                CharacteristicUUID.CONTROL_CHARACTERISTICS);
122
123        if (rawBleNotifyUuids.contains(uuid)) {
124            // normal
125        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.QUALIFYING_EVENTS_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
126            // Qualifying event of:
127            // bluetoothGattCharacteristic.getIntValue(20, 0).intValue()
128            throw new NotImplementedException("Qualifying event characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
129        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.HISTORY_LOG_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
130            // stream write
131            //throw new NotImplementedException("History log characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
132        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.SERVICE_CHANGED_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
133            // onServiceCharacteristicsChanged
134            throw new NotImplementedException("Service changed characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
135        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.CONTROL_STREAM_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
136            // Control stream (opcodes: -27, -25, -23)
137            //throw new NotImplementedException("Control stream characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
138        } else {
139            throw new NotImplementedException("Unsupported UUID: " + uuid + " output: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
140        }
141    }
142}
